name: MindGym
description: MindGym is a mobile-first cognitive fitness platform that transforms mental training into a daily habit—just like physical workouts. Built on neuroscience-backed exercises and adaptive difficulty, MindGym strengthens memory, focus, problem-solving, emotional regulation, and cognitive endurance through short, engaging sessions. MindGym is a robust and well-structured application that effectively combines cognitive science with gamification.
features: Working Memory (Updating) – Active memory & Mental tracking (Full Version)
Impulse Control (Under Pressure) – self-control under pressure (Full Version)
Emotional Regulation (Breathing) – stress and arousal control (Full Version)
